content.eamr: ( ing-0 "4 medium baked potatoes, quartered lengthwise" )

content.text: 1/3 cup Hidden Valley Original Ranch Salad Dressing
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1/3 cup Hidden Valley Original Ranch Salad Dressing" )

content.text: 1) Scoop the potato out of skins; coat inside of skins with Ranch.
4) Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "10 minutes"@12:22 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until cheese is melted"@26:48 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Garnish with green onions and/or bacon bits, if desired.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Garnish"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "green onions"@16:28 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "bacon bits"@36:46 / FOOD )
	)
)
